vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.7.16;
son of: Sheresh (H8329);
brother of: Rakem (H7552J);
father of: Bedan (H0917)
§ Ulam = "their leader: vestibule"
1) a Manassite
2) a Benjamite of Saul's family
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1b)   solamente; (2a)   hijo de Peres; tribu de Manasés; (2b)   hijo de Ésec; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
烏蘭 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他們的領袖"
1) 一位瑪拿西人
2) 掃羅家的一位便雅憫人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
乌兰 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他们的领袖"
1) 一位玛拿西人
2) 扫罗家的一位便雅悯人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.39;
son of: Eleasah (H0501H);
brother of: Jeush (H3266I) and Eliphelet (H0467J)
§ Ulam = "their leader: vestibule"
1) a Manassite
2) a Benjamite of Saul's family
